languages.text: "Из-за тебя, образец! Из-за твоего скудоумия и прискорбной упрямости в нежелании умирать!" {n}В липкой тишине раздается несколько щелчков — копии шевелят своими лапами, словно насекомые.{/n} "Но я должен был закончить начатое... закончить свой шедевр, который у меня отняли! Из-за тебя! Все — из-за тебя!"

traits.locale_text: "Из-за тебя, образец! Из-за твоего скудоумия и прискорбной упрямости в нежелании умирать!" {n}В липкой тишине раздается несколько щелчков — копии шевелят своими лапами, словно насекомые.{/n} "Но я должен был закончить начатое... закончить свой шедевр, который у меня отняли! Из-за тебя! Все — из-за тебя!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: "Because of you, specimen! Because of your feeble wits and your deplorably stubborn reluctance to die!" {n}In the thick silence, several clicks are heard as the copies move their limbs in an insect-like fashion.{/n} "But I had to finish what I had started... finish the masterpiece that had been taken away from me! Because of you! All because of you!"
languages.original_text: "Из-за тебя, образец! Из-за твоего скудоумия и прискорбной упрямости в нежелании умирать!" {n}В липкой тишине раздается несколько щелчков — копии шевелят своими лапами, словно насекомые.{/n} "Но я должен был закончить начатое... закончить свой шедевр, который у меня отняли! Из-за тебя! Все — из-за тебя!"

Because of your feeble wits and your deplorably stubborn reluctance to die!" {n}In the thick silence, several clicks are heard as the copies move their limbs in an insect-like fashion.{/n} "But I had to finish what I had started... finish the masterpiece that had been taken away from me! Because of you! All because of you!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: “这一切都是你害的，实验对象！因为你的愚蠢！因为你固执地不肯去死！”{n}许多声“咔哒”声打破了寂静，血伶人的复制体像昆虫一样颤抖着附肢。{/n}“但既然已经开始了，我就必须把它完成……我要完成那件被人夺走的杰作！这都是因为你！一切都是你害的！”
languages.original_text: "Because of you, specimen! Because of your feeble wits and your deplorably stubborn reluctance to die!" {n}In the thick silence, several clicks are heard as the copies move their limbs in an insect-like fashion.{/n} "But I had to finish what I had started... finish the masterpiece that had been taken away from me! Because of you! All because of you!"

traits.locale_text: “这一切都是你害的，实验对象！因为你的愚蠢！因为你固执地不肯去死！”{n}许多声“咔哒”声打破了寂静，血伶人的复制体像昆虫一样颤抖着附肢。{/n}“但既然已经开始了，我就必须把它完成……我要完成那件被人夺走的杰作！这都是因为你！一切都是你害的！”
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: "Euretwegen, Versuchsstück! Wegen Eures dümmlichen Verstands und Eurer widerwärtig sturen Weigerung, zu sterben!" {n}In dem schweren Schweigen, das in der Luft hängt, sind Klickgeräusche zu hören. Die Kopien bewegen ihre Glieder wie Insekten.{/n} "Doch ich musste zu Ende bringen, was ich begonnen hatte ... Das Meisterwerk vollenden, das man mir geraubt hatte! Euretwegen! Nur Euretwegen!"
languages.original_text: "Because of you, specimen! Because of your feeble wits and your deplorably stubborn reluctance to die!" {n}In the thick silence, several clicks are heard as the copies move their limbs in an insect-like fashion.{/n} "But I had to finish what I had started... finish the masterpiece that had been taken away from me! Because of you! All because of you!"

traits.locale_text: "Euretwegen, Versuchsstück! Wegen Eures dümmlichen Verstands und Eurer widerwärtig sturen Weigerung, zu sterben!" {n}In dem schweren Schweigen, das in der Luft hängt, sind Klickgeräusche zu hören. Die Kopien bewegen ihre Glieder wie Insekten.{/n} "Doch ich musste zu Ende bringen, was ich begonnen hatte ... Das Meisterwerk vollenden, das man mir geraubt hatte! Euretwegen! Nur Euretwegen!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: «¡Por tu culpa, espécimen! ¡Por tu escasa sensatez y tu deplorable reticencia a morir!». {n}En el opresivo silencio, solo se oyen los chasquidos de los apéndices que las copias mueven como patas de insecto.{/n} «Pero tenía que acabar lo que empecé... ¡completar la obra maestra que me fue arrebatada! ¡Por tu culpa! ¡Todo por tu culpa!».
languages.original_text: "Because of you, specimen! Because of your feeble wits and your deplorably stubborn reluctance to die!" {n}In the thick silence, several clicks are heard as the copies move their limbs in an insect-like fashion.{/n} "But I had to finish what I had started... finish the masterpiece that had been taken away from me! Because of you! All because of you!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por tu culpa, espécimen! ¡Por tu escasa sensatez y tu deplorable reticencia a morir!». {n}En el opresivo silencio, solo se oyen los chasquidos de los apéndices que las copias mueven como patas de insecto.{/n} «Pero tenía que acabar lo que empecé... ¡completar la obra maestra que me fue arrebatada! ¡Por tu culpa! ¡Todo por tu culpa!».
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: « Par votre faute, spécimen ! À cause de votre faiblesse d'esprit et de votre obstination particulièrement déplorable à survivre ! » {n}Le lourd silence qui s'ensuit est uniquement troublé par les cliquetis que produisent les membres des copies, comme s'il s'agissait d'insectes.{/n} « Mais je devais finir ce que j'avais commencé... Je devais achever le chef-d'œuvre dont j'avais été privé ! Par votre faute ! Car tout est de votre faute ! »
languages.original_text: "Because of you, specimen! Because of your feeble wits and your deplorably stubborn reluctance to die!" {n}In the thick silence, several clicks are heard as the copies move their limbs in an insect-like fashion.{/n} "But I had to finish what I had started... finish the masterpiece that had been taken away from me! Because of you! All because of you!"

traits.locale_text: « Par votre faute, spécimen ! À cause de votre faiblesse d'esprit et de votre obstination particulièrement déplorable à survivre ! » {n}Le lourd silence qui s'ensuit est uniquement troublé par les cliquetis que produisent les membres des copies, comme s'il s'agissait d'insectes.{/n} « Mais je devais finir ce que j'avais commencé... Je devais achever le chef-d'œuvre dont j'avais été privé ! Par votre faute ! Car tout est de votre faute ! »
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: 「お前のせいだ、標本！お前の脆い知性と、死を厭う嘆かわしいほど頑固な性格のせいだ！」{n}濃い沈黙の中で、コピーたちが昆虫のように手足を動かす音が何度か聞こえる。{/n}「しかし私は、自分が始めたことを終わらせなければならなかった...私から奪われた傑作を完成させなければならなかった！お前のせいだ！全てはお前のせいなのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Because of you, specimen! Because of your feeble wits and your deplorably stubborn reluctance to die!" {n}In the thick silence, several clicks are heard as the copies move their limbs in an insect-like fashion.{/n} "But I had to finish what I had started... finish the masterpiece that had been taken away from me! Because of you! All because of you!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前のせいだ、標本！お前の脆い知性と、死を厭う嘆かわしいほど頑固な性格のせいだ！」{n}濃い沈黙の中で、コピーたちが昆虫のように手足を動かす音が何度か聞こえる。{/n}「しかし私は、自分が始めたことを終わらせなければならなかった...私から奪われた傑作を完成させなければならなかった！お前のせいだ！全てはお前のせいなのだ！」
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: "Neden olacak, senin yüzünden numune! Akılsızlığın, ölmeyi beceremeyişin yüzünden!" {n}Boğucu sessizlik arasında kopyalar, uzuvlarını birer böcek gibi oynattıkça tıkırtılar duyuluyor.{/n} "Ancak başladığım işi... Benden alınan şaheseri bitirmem gerekti! Senin yüzünden! Hepsi senin yüzünden!"
languages.original_text: "Because of you, specimen! Because of your feeble wits and your deplorably stubborn reluctance to die!" {n}In the thick silence, several clicks are heard as the copies move their limbs in an insect-like fashion.{/n} "But I had to finish what I had started... finish the masterpiece that had been taken away from me! Because of you! All because of you!"
